resources.string:
• You will be shown two card.
 • Guess if the secret card is higher or lower than the previous card.
 • If you get one wrong, you lose a life.
 • If you don't have any life left, you lose the game.
 • The objective is to beat high score by guessing correctly without losing the game. 

 • There is three levels who have different amount of lives.
 • The level "easy" has three lives.
 • The level "medium" has two lives.
 • The level "hard" has only one life.
If the user do not understand how to play, the user can press the question mark and read how to play
